heading: # Click outside
headingText: The `v-click-outside` directive calls a function when something outside of the target element is clicked on. This is used internally by components like `v-menu` and `v-dialog`.

usage.desc: The `v-click-outside` directive allows you to provide a handler to be invoked when the user clicks outside of the target element.

close-conditional.heading: ### Conditional handler
close-conditional.desc: Optionally provide a `closeOnOutsideClick` handler that returns `true` or `false`. This function determines whether the outside click function is invoked or not.
